categories: Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Human female Zal Artha was a former Imperial pilot who graduated from the Rengali Imperial Naval Academy. She defected to the Rebel Alliance after viewing the Empire as tyrannical government and was one of two survivors of the Soaring Dactillions following the assault on Cardooine. She then requested to join Alliance Special Operations.
Zal Artha appears in Fantasy Flight Games' 2014 roleplaying game Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Beginner Game.
